skins.shipDescription: Fletcher-class destroyer ¨C Halsey Powell, Hull Number DD-686.
skins.selfIntroduction: There are a lot of us Fletchers, but nobody's done a better job of supporting than Halsey Powell! Whether it's anti-air or anti-sub, nobody out there can match me!
skins.acquisition: There you are, Commander! Ehehe~ Huh? You've never heard of me? Jeez, I'm Halsey Powell! Don't you forget it!
skins.login: Staaaaaare... Commander doesn't look any different today!
skins.details: Ehehe~ See, Commander, you're totally into me after all, aren't you~?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Bad little submarines, come out, come out, wherever you are~
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm a bit jealous of the Little Beavers... If only I had the same legendary feats as them...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Jeez, Commander, you have such a cute and capable Destroyer right next to you, but you're so absorbed in your work!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, are you in a pickle? Do you need my help? Hehe, I'd be glad to give you a hand, but the cute little Halsey Powell won't work for free... Hmm, if you treat me to lots of tasty snacks, we have a deal!

skins.shipDescription: Halsey Powell is making her debut as your lucky star for the Spring Festival! Commander, if you show me a fun time, you'll be blessed with good luck this year!
skins.acquisition: Halsey Powell is making her debut as your lucky star for the Spring Festival! Commander, if you show me a fun time, you'll be blessed with good luck this year!
skins.login: Commander, Happy Spring Festival! Um, hey, where's my red envelope?
skins.details: The Dragon Empery's lucky star is an old geezer? I see... W-wait! I don't want to be the lucky star anymore!
skins.secretaryIdle1: I want to eat something sweet and fluffy...
skins.secretaryIdle2: The Zodiac is really neat! But... why is there a dog and a rat on there but no cat?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, why don't we make a huge paper lantern? One that stands out from the rest!
skins.secretaryTouch: If you're ever in trouble, just leave it to your lucky star, Halsey Powell!
